The results are valuable for the further development of CIT and its clinical applications.
本文有关结果对于进一步完善CIT技术和促进它在临床上的应用具有一定的价值.
The government decided against rescuing CIT Group -- and that has $ 54 billion of borrowings.
政府决定不救助CIT集团( CITGroup ),后者负债为540亿美元.
The US lender, CIT Group, has filed for bankruptcy protection, after debt - exchange offer to bondholders failed.
在与债券持有人融资失败之后,美国金融出贷方CIT集团申请破产保护.
DNA sequence analysis conformed that 1 EBC and 1 CIT were new ampC gene.
1株EBC阳性株和1株CIT阳性株测序证实为新的ampC基因型.
